lead_paragraph: Takanobu Ito, the chief executive of Honda, to be succeeded by Takahiro Hachigo, a low-profile engineer with global experience.

headline.main: In Surprise Move, Honda Chief to Step Down
headline.print_headline: In Surprise Move, Honda Chief to Step Down

snippet: Takanobu Ito, the chief executive of Honda, to be succeeded by Takahiro Hachigo, a low-profile engineer with global experience.
